recommendations: ‚ÄúJebin is a principled and hard-working HR professional. After cutting his teeth as a recruiter for Iffco - UAE over several years, Jebin was moved as a HR Business Partner to the Institutions Business Group. As a HR Business Partner, Jebin's role included the implementation of HR Policy and Programmes apart from problem solving and management of HR Issues within the Institutions Business Group. He carried out his role without bending to pressures or compromising principles. As a Recruiter, he was based at the Corporate Office and participated in the desigm elements of several HR Programmes. Notable amongst these were, the authorship of a Job Descriptions Manual and as a Trainer on Corporate Values. Jebin is a valuable HR professional and I wish him well.‚Äù Show less

‚ÄúI know Jebin as a person who is completely dedicated to work. He approach every work professionally and accomplish it with a view to derive maximum satisfaction out of it. He is trustworthy and deals with complex problems and situations tactfully and achieves and rather exceeds the business goals. We have worked together for more than two years and he extended his kind support in every endeavor that I undertook to improve productivity across the various factories of IFFCO group. I am quite impressed by his creative thinking and business analysis skills apart from deep knowledge in the field of human resources. He aptly combines statistics to support HR policies and decisions. He has contributed a lot in formulating compensation and benefits schemes for individual factory units and at the corporate level in IFFCO group. He also has detailed understanding of operations of FMCG business units, which is an added advantage when dealing with day to day situational problems at hand. He is an asset for any organization that he chooses to work with. He is an honest, dependable HR manager who practices highest standards of business ethics and corporate social responsibility. I wish him good luck and success in the professional and personal life ahead!‚Äù Show less
